sentence.content: For example, ``Citizen Kane,&apost;&apost; which customarily places No. 1 on polls of the greatest American films, was nominated in 1941 for best picture (there were 10 nominees in those days), for Orson Welles&apost; performance, direction and co-scripting with Herman Mankiewicz, Gregg Toland&apost;s camera work, plus art direction, sound, music and editing.
